attributes.action: Require councils to give everyone a month off of paying council tax
attributes.additional_details: We pay council tax for the council to do things. We feel that their obligations have not been met.
attributes.background: We want the government to give everyone a month off from paying council tax. We are concerned that there are potholes on the roads, roads have been left ungritted and household waste has sometimes not been collected.

departments.name: Ministry of Housing, Communities & Local Government
